DOC.brief_summary: Very preterm baby frequently develop problem blood circulation first day birth . These circulation problem could affect oxygen blood flow brain lead effect bleed head delay developmental milestone later life . Currently care problem may include transfusion intravenous fluid blood baby and/or give baby medication help circulation . The current practice delivery baby immediately clamp umbilical cord birth . Recent research study show give baby 's blood birth delay cord clamping ( wait clamp cord 30-90 second ) milking cord , may reduce number blood transfusion baby may need later . It may also improve initial blood pressure reduce chance bleed head . More research need prove either delayed cord clamp milk cord birth well term improve baby ' health . The aim study find add blood baby ' circulation , milk cord birth , could prevent reduce possible problem blood circulation reduce blood flow brain baby may birth . The investigator also investigate milk cord birth could improve long-term developmental outcome . Hypothesis : In preterm infant less 31 week ' gestation , milk umbilical cord 3 time prior clamp , compare immediate clamp birth improve systemic blood flow ( assessed improve superior vena cava flow measure heart ultrasound first 24 hour birth )
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Cord Milking Hemodynamic Status Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible mother randomize prior delivery preterm labour establish ( cervical dilatation > 4cm preterm birth consider inevitable delivery indicate maternal fetal indication ) either milk umbilical cord infant ( intervention group ) clamp cord per standard practice ( currently immediate cord clamp ) birth ( control group ) . Randomization do variable block size conceal use opaque envelope prepare ahead time randomization table . Envelopes open time delivery .
DOC.criteria: Preterm infant < 31 week ' gestation mother fulfill follow inclusion criterion : 1. admitted hospital least 2 hour delivery preterm labor ( cervical dilatation > 2 cm premature rupture membrane ) decision induce labour make treat physician maternal fetal indication ) . 2. 24+0 week 30+6/7 week gestation ( best estimate base date last menstrual period early ultrasound ) 1. monochorionic twin high order multiple pregnancy 2. major fetal congenital chromosomal anomaly 3. significant placental abruption 4. fetal anemia/transfusion 5 . Rh isoimmunization 6. intent withhold withdraw treatment infant
